means: 山柳菊属植物（水兰属的一种）

sentence.Network_en: European hawkweed introduced into northeastern United States ; locally troublesome weeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国东北部引入的欧洲山柳菊; 不易根除的杂草.

sentence.Network_en: European hawkweed having soft hairy leaves; sometimes placed in genus Hieracium.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶子上有柔毛的欧洲山柳菊属植物; 有时归为山柳菊属.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English, rendering Latin hieracium, based on Greek hierax 'hawk'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various plants of the genus Pilosella
2. any of numerous often hairy plants of the genus Hieracium having yellow or orange flowers that resemble the dandelion
